documents.document: Nice @brentmusburger tribute from @SteveKornacki just now.

Oh FFS
Maybe one of these local TV folks on Skype can ask Spicer if they have a back-up nominee for EdSec?

Aside from the "we" talk at the outset, almost no effort to recalibrate the angry, divisive campaign rhetoric for Inauguration Day.
Inaugural speech doesn't just "sound like" his campaign speech. That ending WAS his campaign speech.

Remember, guys, there is no pivot.
Trump's stark imagery of "American carnage" is remarkable in an inaugural address.
"We the citizens of America," Trump begins. Big departure from "I am your voice...I alone can fix it."
